org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg

类 Vectors

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors

  • public class Vectors
extends Object
    Factory methods for Vector. We don't use the name Vector because Scala imports scala.collection.immutable.Vector by default.

    • 构造器概要

      Creates a sparse vector using unordered (index, value) pairs.

      • sparse

        public static Vector sparse(int size,
                            int[] indices,
                            double[] values)
        Creates a sparse vector providing its index array and value array.

        参数:
        size - vector size.
        indices - index array, must be strictly increasing.
        values - value array, must have the same length as indices.
        返回:
        (undocumented)

      • sparse

        public static Vector sparse(int size,
                            scala.collection.Seq<scala.Tuple2<Object,Object>> elements)
        Creates a sparse vector using unordered (index, value) pairs.

        参数:
        size - vector size.
        elements - vector elements in (index, value) pairs.
        返回:
        (undocumented)

        elements - vector elements in (index, value) pairs.

        public static double norm(Vector vector,
                          double p)
        Returns the p-norm of this vector.
        参数:

        p - norm.
        返回:
        norm in L^p^ space.

        Returns the squared distance between two Vectors.
        参数:

        v2 - second Vector.
        返回:
        squared distance between two Vectors.
